### Checkbox

勾选框

-   `type` 请设置成 `checkbox`
-   `option` 选项说明
-   `trueValue` 默认 `true`
-   `falseValue` 默认 `false`
-   **还有更多通用配置请参考** [FormItem](./FormItem.md)

```schema:height="200" scope="form-item"
{
  "name": "checkbox",
  "type": "checkbox",
  "label": "Checkbox",
  "option": "选项说明"
}
```
